amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for the Afghanistan Infrastructure Fund by $79 million and applies the savings to the Spending Reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 27 printed in House Report 113-170 to reduce the Afghanistan Infrastructure Fund by $79 million and transfers the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A026) Agreed to by recorded vote: 283 - 139 (Roll no. 387).
